title: Make Citrus Gardens you next Home!!! Apply today!!
posting_body: ['Visit our property website for the most up to date availability- <URL>', 'Citrus Gardens Apartment Homes is a beautiful community with controlled access parking located just blocks away from West Covina Plaza.', 'You will find us nestled in a beautiful residential neighborhood, our garden style apartments in West Covina are close to the 10, 57, and 605 freeways to make your commute easier.', 'Apartment Features:', '• Huge Spacious Floor Plans*', '• Vinyl Plank Flooring - Carpeting in bedroom(s)', '• Energy Efficient Windows', '• Ceiling Fan in Dining Room', '• Kitchen appliances included: Refrigerator, Microwave, Electric Stove, Dishwasher*', '• New Cabinetry*', '• Faux Quartz Counter tops*', '• Air Conditioning (Wall Unit) & Heating', '• Patio*', '(*) Included in select units only', 'Community Amenities:', '• Pet Friendly', '• Pet Stations', '• Limited Access Entry Gates', '• Beautiful Courtyards', '• Covered Parking', '• Newly Renovated Fitness Center', '• Four Card Operated Laundry Facilities', '• 2 Sparkling Pools', 'Easy Access to 10 and 605 Freeways & Near Public Transportation', 'Flexible lease terms: 3 - 15 Months', 'NOTE: Images are used as reference to finishes such as (flooring, cabinetry, appliances) but may not be of actual apartment available.']
